file_content.text:
Leebo Nobim has outlined the parameters for a high-priority mission in the Highmount Ridge sector of Hoth. For additional details about the mission, Leebo Nobim may be contacted in-person. Otherwise, the mission may be initiated from this terminal for your convenience.
This mission may require a small group. It may be completed once per week.

Captain Grollix has outlined the parameters for a high-priority mission in the Starship Graveyard sector of Hoth. For additional details about the mission, Captain Grollix may be contacted in-person. Otherwise, the mission may be initiated from this terminal for your convenience.
This mission may require a small group. It may be completed once per week.
